author: Megan Leonhardt
title: Dave Ramsey tells students: Skip the 'dream' college and go to school where you can afford
description: When it comes to picking a college, Dave Ramsey says too many students and their families are more focused on attending that all-important "dream school," than seriously considering what student loan debt will do to their lives 20 or 30 years down the line. A…
